ComicInfo.Summary: 'TRUE BELIEVERS' James undergoes a police interrogation while the Hand settles an old score. It all starts with two packages, a straightjacket and an intercom.
ComicInfo.Teams: New York Police Department,United States Senate
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Five: True Believers
